entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 1 April 2023
